images.caption: Setup of a scanner Radar system for tracking glacial movement, May 2013.
Long range LiDAR system setup at Hubbard Glacier, scanning the glacier every 5-minutes, May 2013.
Adam LeWinter configuring the LiDAR system at Hubbard Glacier, May 2013.
Small calving event while the Radar and LiDAR units scan the Hubbard Glacier, May 2013.
View looking West through the gap between Hubbard Glacier and Gilbert Point, May 2013.
Hubbard Glacier calving front with Gilbert Point in the background, May 2013.
View looking East through the gap between Hubbard Glacier and Gilbert Point, May 2013.
An old picture of Hubbard Glacier
